welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mardan, a city known for its rich historical and cultural heritage. Explore our vibrant bazaars, ancient archaeological sites, and warm hospitality as you immerse yourself in the charm of our city. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Mardan!
